templates.name: Login Page
templates.description: Complete login page with email/password form, social login options, and remember me functionality

templates.name: Dashboard Overview
templates.description: Complete dashboard overview page with stats cards, analytics chart area, and activity feed

templates.name: Landing Page
templates.description: Complete marketing landing page with hero section, feature grid, testimonials, and CTA

templates.name: AI Analysis Page
templates.description: Complete AI analysis workflow page with image upload, processing progress, and results display. Perfect for HomeCheck AI, SkinCheck AI, and similar applications.

templates.name: Chat Interface
templates.description: Full-page conversational AI interface with message history, suggestions, voice input, and optional context panel. Ideal for search refinement and AI assistants.
